author: mseidel42
body:
**PR description:**

Updating to latest Pythia version, notable changes:
- removes Dire shower (no longer maintained)
- adds toponium models

No changes to CMSSW needed as far as I can see.

Would be great to include this in CMSSW_16_0_0_pre3, as discussed with @cms-sw/generators-l2 privately

**PR validation:**

```
Pass    4s ... GeneratorInterface/Pythia8Interface/TestGeneratorInterfacePythia8InterfaceCompareIdentical
Pass    6s ... GeneratorInterface/Pythia8Interface/TestGeneratorInterfacePythia8InterfaceCompareExternal
Pass   11s ... GeneratorInterface/Pythia8Interface/TestGeneratorInterfacePythia8InterfaceCompareExternalStreams
Pass   28s ... GeneratorInterface/Pythia8Interface/TestGeneratorInterfacePythia8ConcurrentGeneratorFilter
Pass   25s ... GeneratorInterface/EvtGenInterface/TestGeneratorInterfaceEvtGenInterface_bplus
Pass   14s ... GeneratorInterface/Pythia8Interface/testGeneratorInterfacePythia8InterfaceTP
Pass   27s ... GeneratorInterface/EvtGenInterface/TestGeneratorInterfaceEvtGenInterface_external_bplus
Pass   71s ... GeneratorInterface/EvtGenInterface/GeneratorInterfaceEvtGenInterfaceTest
Pass  989s ... TauAnalysis/MCEmbeddingTools/testTauEmbeddingWorkflow2016postVFP
Pass 1025s ... TauAnalysis/MCEmbeddingTools/testTauEmbeddingWorkflow2016preVFP
Pass 1330s ... TauAnalysis/MCEmbeddingTools/testTauEmbeddingWorkflow2022postEE
Pass 1481s ... TauAnalysis/MCEmbeddingTools/testTauEmbeddingWorkflow2018
Pass 1802s ... TauAnalysis/MCEmbeddingTools/testTauEmbeddingWorkflow2017
>> Test sequence completed for CMSSW CMSSW_16_0_X_2025-11-18-1100
```
title: Pythia 8.316
